tool_description: Collects and validates basic demographic information for patient registration including personal details, contact information, and identification data.

date_of_birth.description: Patient's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

phone_number.description: Primary phone number in format XXX-XXX-XXXX

error_messages: Invalid name format: Names must contain only letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes.
Invalid date of birth: Must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and represent a valid past date.
Invalid gender selection: Must be one of [male, female, other, prefer_not_to_say].
Invalid phone number format: Must follow XXX-XXX-XXXX pattern with valid area code.
usage: Provide all required demographic fields to create a basic patient profile. Ensure all data is accurate as this forms the foundation of the medical record.

validation_status.description: Status of data validation (valid, invalid, needs_review)
